snippet.title: Ghosts of Tabor - Early Access Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Ghosts of Tabor is a multiplayer VR survival military shooter set in post-apocalyptic war. Inspired by games such as DAYZ, Escape From Tarkov and ARMA, your obejective is to scavage, complete scenarios and survive. Ghosts of Tabor is developed by a Veteran owned game developer; Combat Waffle Studios, Inc. based in Port Charlotte, Florida.

Sign up for alpha at our website-
http://ghostsoftabor.com

Join our discord -
https://discord.gg/ghostsoftabor

Target platforms include: PC VR, Oculus Quest 2, and PlayStation VR2.
Cinematic footage may not reflect the final game.

#GhostsofTabor #VR
